About Me

This page, as well as the rest of the site, is responsive

OBJECTIVE

  • Specializes in web development using
    • HTML5/CSS3/JavaScript/JQuery/SASS, with experience in Angular and React development
    • Modern JS toolsets (ES6/JSON/npm/Webpack/Babel/etc)
    • ASP.NET with C#/SQL/XML
  • Focused on Cross-browser compatibility, responsive design and ADA compliance
  • Experience with Drupal, Wordpress (PHP), Bootstrap and other JS plug-ins
  • CMS/Source Control System – Git/Github, Kentico CMS, Vignette, etc
  • Experience with Adobe SiteImprove/SiteCatalyst and GSA/GA
  • Experience with Agile/SCRUM work environment
  • Other Programming Languages: C/C++
  • Self-motivated and team-oriented

INTRADO / WEST / NASDAQ

Front End Web Developer

  • Provided support for the internal press release distribution system and public facing IR sites
  • Part of tech escalation team dealing with over 13000 tickets/year for 2100+ websites with 87% positive responses
  • Notable clients include: Tesla, GM, Dell, AMD, Hershey, IMAX, Nordstrom, Tripadvisor, Expedia, Radisson, Gamestop(EBGames) Hasbro, Mattel, Harley-Davidson, Texas Instrument, iRobot, etc
  • Built and maintained websites using Drupal/Acquia Site Factory
  • Participated in migrating and merging websites on the legacy system onto the modernized and streamlined platform
  • Expanded online knowledge base for both internal and external usage
  • Built custom sites from client templates
  • Became familiar with PDLC process and Agile/SCRUM work process
  • Communicated with multiple websites managers to resolve client’s issues on a daily basis

MARKETWIRED

Front End Web Developer

  • Built and maintained PR/IR sites for various clients such as McDonalds, BMO, Scotia Bank, Cisco, etc
  • Responsible for upgrading old sites to new standard with Responsive design
  • Utilized many different libraries/frameworks/plugins to cater to individual client's needs (JQuery, Bootstrap, Wordpress, etc)
  • Tasked with helping clients directly regarding their requests to adjust their IR sites
  • Communicated with various clients to understand and resolve the issues they have
  • Built custom sites from wireframe
  • Provided backend support to manage data on IR sites utilizing MS-SQL
  • Created custom pages on Kentiko CMS using ASP.NET with C#

BMO

Front End Web Developer

  • Part of the team responsible for developing and maintaining bmo.com pages as well as various promotions, online landing pages and marketing microsites
  • Participated and took a major role in BMO Harris bank website design overhaul, which was one of the biggest projects BMO eChannel undertook
  • Integral part of developing and launching the biggest MasterCard campaign of 2013 on bmo.com
  • In charge of maintaining mortgage/financial calculators on bmo.com
  • Responsible for maintaining locators on various BMO pages and their data
  • Tasked with form validation and search result on various BMO pages
  • Developed webpages to meet web accessibility and to achieve cross browser compatibility including IE7-10, FF, Chrome and Safari
  • Consulted and worked with many business managers to implement their requirements and updates
  • Worked closely with the design team to ensure the best end result was delivered
  • Started/participated in internal projects to increase the productivity of the development team
